data.title: The Mount Sinai Hospital - New York City
data.meta_description: Founded in 1852, The Mount Sinai Hospital, located in New York City, is one of the nation’s largest and most respected hospitals, acclaimed internationally for excellence in clinical care.
data.text:
The Mount Sinai Hospital

Founded in 1852, The Mount Sinai Hospital is one of the nation’s largest and most respected hospitals, acclaimed internationally for excellence in clinical care. Ranked among the top hospitals nationwide, we serve one of the most diverse populations in the world. The Mount Sinai Hospital is listed on the U.S. News & World Report® "Best Hospitals Honor Roll" for 2024-25 and 11 of our specialties are ranked nationally. Our pediatric center, Mount Sinai Kravis Children’s Hospital, is also recognized on U.S. News & World Report's® 2023-24 Best Children's Hospitals rankings.
